participant_1.background:
I am male.
I live to not disappoint my loved ones.
I am unsociable.
I am a jack of all , master of none.
My weakness are sweets.

participant_2.background:
My favorite meal is steak.
I always travel alone.
I only sleep 3 hours a day.
I am incredibly smart.
I have no parents or siblings.

content.text: I'm not very social either. I find it easier to talk to people online than in person.
I find talking to people in person to be boring. I prefer to keep to myself.
I think it's nice to be able to socialize with people, but I understand why you prefer to be alone.
I like to be in control of my environment, and when I'm alone, I can do whatever I want without having to worry about anyone else.
That makes sense. I think it's important to have some time to yourself each day, even if you're an extrovert.
I agree. It's important to be able to relax and recharge.
Do you have any hobbies?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
Me too! I love to read and play video games.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I especially like RPGs.
Me too! I love the story and character development in RPGs.
I agree. They're really immersive and you can get really attached to the characters.
What's your favorite RPG?
It's hard to say, but I think I would have to say Final Fantasy X.
That's a good choice. It's a classic for a reason.
It is. It's one of the best games ever made.
I agree. It's so well-written and the characters are so well-developed.
I agree. It's a masterpiece.
It is. I'm glad we agree.
